reviewText: Good movie, good action by Mithun and Yogita bali The movie Aakhri Badla is the 1989 Bollywood movie is directed by Manga Chakravarty with leading star cast Mithun Chakravarty, Yogeeta Bali in leading role. The movie well describes about a game between a cat and rat. The story reveals about a international smuggling gang plans to moves all their stealed money in the form of Gold, diamond and etc by using ship. But the story gets interest when the ship sinks in the cyclone. So this news come to the Indian Intelligence department and they appoints their operatives Himadri Choudhari, Mantho Ghosh, and a japanese karate master Kitahara to dash the gangster\'s plan.
